snippet.title: Like a Dragon Gaiden: The Man Who Erased His Name | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Like a Dragon Gaiden: The Man Who Erased His Name is AVAILABLE NOW. Buy or add it to your wishlist!
- Xbox Series X|S / Xbox One / Windows: https://www.xbox.com/en-us/games/store/like-a-dragon-gaiden-the-man-who-erased-his-name/9pcmwndppbfz

- PlayStation®5 / PlayStation®4: https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/like-a-dragon-gaiden/

- Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2375550/Like_a_Dragon_Gaiden_The_Man_Who_Erased_His_Name/
